title: Test harness called mladmin abort on 6.0 Linux RH6 in test bug11668.xml, as following XQuery did not finished in 30 minutes, which usually get completed in the said time.
description:
Test harness called mladmin abort on 6.0 Linux RH6 in test bug11668.xml, as following XQuery did not finished in 30 minutes, which usually get completed in the said time.

ML Version : 20130218
Test name : bug11668.xml
